property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you play an attack as a Reversal, you may play any attack in your hand as a Reversal. E: If this attack played as a Reversal deals damage, look at your opponent's hand and choose 1 card. Your opponent discards the chosen card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent plays a card, they play with their hand revealed for the rest of the turn. E Discard 1 momentum: If you block this attack, you may ready X foundations. X equals your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack played as a Reversal deals damage, look at your opponent's hand and choose 1 card. Your opponent discards the chosen card. Alba E: If this attack deals damage, look at your opponent's hand and choose 2 cards. Your opponent discards the chosen cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Look at X random cards in your opponent's hand and choose 1 card. Your opponent discards the chosen card. X equals your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard X cards: This attack gets -X speed. Your opponent may play this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard X momentum: Look at your opponent's hand and choose X cards. Your opponent discards the chosen cards. Your opponent may destroy any number of foundations or assets they control. For each foundation or asset destroyed this way they may prevent 1 card of their choice from being discarded.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Make a control check. Look at X random cards in your opponent's hand and choose 1 card. Your opponent discards the chosen card. X equals the control check.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you completely block an attack, ready this foundation. You may play this ability while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If you block this attack, ready 2 foundations. You may not ready copies of this card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: You have no maximum vitality for the rest of this turn. Gain 2 vitality. During this turn's End Phase, if your vitality is higher than your maximum vitality, reduce your vitality to your maximum vitality. Only playable during your opponent's turn. F Commit: Reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is an attack, gain vitality equal to its control. Draw the revealed card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you completely block an attack, reveal the top card of your deck and gain vitality equal to its control. Draw the revealed card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack (or any of its Multiple copies) is blocked, reveal the top card of your deck. Draw the revealed card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is blocked, reveal the top card of your deck. Draw the revealed card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is an attack, gain vitality equal to its control. Athena R: After this card is played as a block, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is an attack, gain vitality equal to its control.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is an attack, gain vitality equal to its control. Only playable if you have drawn cards during your Combat Phase this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, for the rest of this turn, each time you would gain vitality you may draw 1 card instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Name a card and reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is a copy of the named card, draw it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is an attack, gain vitality equal to its control.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your Stun attack deals damage, cards and abilities you play may not be canceled or negated for the rest of this turn. E: If this mid attack deals damage, gain 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your stun attack deals damage, your opponent may not play response cards or abilities for the rest of this turn. F Commit: Gain 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit X foundations: Gain X vitality unless your opponent commits X foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack deals damage, your opponent commits 3 cards in their staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If your opponent committed foundations due to this attack's Stun ability, cards and abilities you play may not be cancelled or negated for the rest of this Enhance step. This ability may not be cancelled or negated.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: For the rest of this Enhance Step, after your opponent plays an enhance card or ability, negate its effects and your opponent gains 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your Stun attack deals damage, your opponent must commit 1 foundation as an additional cost to play any enhance for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard X momentum: Gain X vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your attack deals damage, ready any 1 foundation. R Commit: After your opponent plays an attack as a Reversal, change the zone of that attack to low.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, commit 1 foundation: If your attack deals damage, ready 2 foundations in your staging area. E Discard 1 Reversal: Change the zone of this attack to low.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: If this attack deals damage, ready X foundations in your staging area that haven't been readied this combat phase. X equals the amount of damage this attack dealt.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0. E: If this attack deals damage, ready 1 foundation in your staging area that hasn't been readied this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Change the zone of this attack to low. Only playable if this attack was played as a Reversal.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before this card is added to your momentum, place it in your staging area instead. F Commit 1 foundation: Take this card from your staging area and play it as though it were in your hand, following All restrictions and paying All costs (no control check necessary). Only playable from your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E Discard 1 momentum: Change the zone of this attack to low. Only playable if this attack was played as a Reversal.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your attack deals damage, ready 1 other foundation in your staging area. You may not ready copies of this card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Change the zone of your attack played as a reversal to low.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Lose 3 vitality: Place 1 Caffeine token on this card. E Commit: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of Caffeine tokens on this card.R Commit: After you block an attack, choose 1 foundation in your discard pile. Make a control check with a difficulty equal to the chosen foundation's difficulty +2. If successful, add the chosen foundation to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this card enters your staging area, place 2 Caffeine tokens on your character card. E Commit, remove 1 Caffeine token from your character card: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of Caffeine tokens on your character card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). R: After you block with this attack, take 1 foundation that shares at least 2 resource symbols with your character card from your discard pile and add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: After you play this card as a block, take 1 foundation card from your discard pile and add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +X damage. X equals either the number of tokens on your character card or the number of other attacks in your card pool. R Commit 1 foundation: After you play this card as a block, take 1 foundation from your discard pile and add it to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack is blocked, your next attack this turn gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack is blocked, your next attack this turn gets +X damage. X equals either the number of tokens on your character card or the number of resource symbols shared by that attack and your character card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Place X Caffeine tokens on this card. X equals your hand size. Only playable while there are 0 Caffeine tokens on this card. E Commit, remove X Caffeine tokens from this card: Your Reversal gets +X damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, commit 2 other foundations: After you completely block an attack, choose 1 foundation in your discard pile. Take All copies of the chosen foundation from your discard pile and add them to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard 1 random momentum: Reveal your momentum. Your opponent chooses 1 card. Play the chosen card as normal (no control check necessary).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, your opponent discards 2 momentum. E Commit: If your attack deals damage, add it to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this card is added to your momentum add it face up. F Discard 2 momentum: You may play this card as if it were in your hand, following All restrictions and paying All costs. Only playable while face up in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0. Hanzo E: Reveal your momentum. Your opponent discards X momentum. X equals the lowest control revealed this way.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E Discard 1 card: If this attack deals damage, add it to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against a ranged attack as if it had a mid block of +0. E Discard 1 card: Name 1 card. Reveal your momentum. If you reveal the named card this way, take 1 card from the top of your deck and add it to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E Discard 2 momentum: Name 1 card. Your opponent reveals their momentum and discards All copies of the named card revealed this way.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent plays an ability on a face up card in their momentum, negate that ability and your opponent discards that card from their momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Reveal 1 random card from your momentum. If the revealed card is a foundation or asset, add it to your staging area committed. If it is an attack, you may attempt to play it as though it were in your hand (following All restrictions and paying All costs). If it is an action, a character, or an attack you do not wish to play, discard the revealed card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Lose X Vitality: Make a control check with a difficulty of X. If you pass, your attack gets +X damage. E Commit, gain X vitality: Your attack gets -X damage. X may not be greater than the printed damage of the attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +3 damage. Only playable if you have gained vitality this turn. R Commit: discard 1 momentum: After you lose 4 or more vitality, gain 3 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals the damage dealt.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack does damage, your next attack this turn gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you lose vitality, this attack gets +X damage. X equals the vitality you lost.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If you add this card to your momentum, add it face up and place 2 Sake tokens on it. R Remove 1 Sake token: After your opponent's character readies, commit it. Only playable if this card is face up in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard 1 momentum, destroy 1 foundation: Gain X vitality. X equals the control of the destroyed foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: After you play a {Fire} card, discard up to 2 {Fire} cards from your card pool. E Commit: Your attack gets +3 damage. Only playable if your attack has a damage of 4 or more.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 2 momentum: Your {Fire} attack with a printed damage of 4 or more gets +8 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 2 momentum: If the next card you play this turn is a {Fire} attack, discard this card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +4 damage. This attack may not get any other damage bonuses this turn. Only playable if this attack has not receieved any other damage bonuses this turn.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: Your {Fire} attack of printed damage 4 or more gets +4 damage.

property.name: CardText

R Discard 1 momentum: Before you make a control check to play an attack as a Reversal, discard 1 card from your hand. Use the discarded card's control for the check (no control check necessary).

property.value: R: After you make a control check, that check is equal to your momentum.

property.name: CardText

When committing foundations to make the control check successful, each momentum you discarded this way counts as 1 committed foundation.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your opponent takes 3 damage. Only playable if your opponent has given a damage bonus to an attack this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Take 1 card from your momentum and add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your attack with greater speed than damage gets 'Multiple: 1'. F Destroy 1 ready foundation: Cards in your card pool do not count toward progressive difficulty for the next {Water} card you play this turn.
